gamepadhotbar.configuration.title: Gamepad Hotbar Config
gamepadhotbar.config.gamepad_hotbar_togg:
ON = Use gamepad hotbar
OFF = Use vanilla hotbar
gamepadhotbar.config.lower_status.toolti: Set to ON to lower the status display to the bottom of the screen
gamepadhotbar.config.mirror_mode.tooltip: When enabled, the hotbar slots will be mirrored to opposite sides of the screen
gamepadhotbar.config.scale_hotbar_x.tool: Adjust the horizontal scale of the hotbar
gamepadhotbar.config.pad_hotbar_x.toolti: Adjust the horizontal offset of the hotbar
gamepadhotbar.config.pad_hotbar_y.toolti: Adjust the vertical offset of the hotbar
gamepadhotbar.config.pos_hotbar_y.toolti: Adjust the vertical position of the hotbar
